components.name: Alert
components.recommendedUsage: Display important messages about system state or user actions
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for inline validation errors; use FieldError instead

components.name: Toast

knownLimitations: Does not steal focus by design; may be missed by screen reader users if dismissed quickly

components.recommendedUsage: Non-blocking notifications for async operations and background events
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for critical errors requiring user acknowledgment; use AlertDialog instead

components.name: Progress
components.recommendedUsage: Show loading progress for determinate or indeterminate operations
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for page-level loading; use Skeleton or Spinner instead

components.name: Badge

knownLimitations: Decorative; ensure parent element has accessible name if badge conveys important info

components.recommendedUsage: Display counts, status indicators, or notifications on icons/avatars
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for interactive elements; Badge is display-only

components.name: Avatar
components.recommendedUsage: Display user profile images with fallback to initials
components.antiPatterns: Do not use decorative avatars without alt text

components.name: AvatarGroup
components.recommendedUsage: Display multiple avatars with overflow indicator
components.antiPatterns: Avoid showing more than 5-7 visible avatars for clarity

components.name: Table
components.recommendedUsage: Display structured data in rows and columns with sorting and selection
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for layout purposes; use CSS Grid instead

components.name: DataTable

knownLimitations: Virtualization may cause screen reader navigation issues with very large datasets

components.recommendedUsage: Display large datasets with virtualization, filtering, and pagination
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for small datasets (<100 rows); use Table instead for better accessibility

components.name: Skeleton
components.recommendedUsage: Show loading placeholders that match content layout
components.antiPatterns: Do not animate if user prefers reduced motion

components.name: Tag
components.recommendedUsage: Display categorization labels with optional remove action
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for navigation; use Link instead

components.name: List
components.recommendedUsage: Display selectable collections with keyboard navigation
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for static lists; use semantic HTML ul/li instead

components.name: Tree
components.recommendedUsage: Display and navigate hierarchical data structures
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for flat lists; use List instead

components.name: Calendar
components.recommendedUsage: Display month grid for date visualization and event display
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for date input; use DatePicker instead

components.name: Portal

knownLimitations: Ensure focus management is handled by consuming component

components.recommendedUsage: Render children outside DOM hierarchy for overlays and modals
components.antiPatterns: Do not use for non-overlay content; breaks document flow

components.name: FocusScope
components.recommendedUsage: Trap focus within modal dialogs and overlay components
components.antiPatterns: Do not trap focus for non-modal content

components.name: ClientOnly
components.antiPatterns: Do not wrap entire app; use sparingly for client-only features
